title: Authentication Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully authenticate with valid username and password, receiving a valid JWT token granting access based on user role. Use password: 28150503

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter password: 28150503 (no username field, password-only login)
Submit login request
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify JWT token is issued and role-based access assigned
Verify access to authorized resources based on role

title: Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure that login attempts with invalid username or password fail with appropriate error messages and no token is issued.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username or password
Submit login request
Verify response is 401 Unauthorized
Verify no JWT token is issued
Verify error message indicates invalid credentials
